nodes.name: Print N Rows
nodes.description: Prints the specified number of records in the DataFrame. It is useful for seeing intermediate output
nodes.details:
This node is used to print incoming dataset.

Number of rows that needs to be printed can be configured in the node.

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: n
fields.title: Num Rows to Print
fields.description: number of rows to be printed

fields.name: displayDataType
fields.title: Display Data Type
fields.description: If true display rows DataType

nodes.name: Drop Rows With Null
nodes.description: This node creates a new DataFrame by dropping rows containing null values
nodes.details: This node creates a new DataFrame by dropping rows containing NULL values in any of the columns.
nodes.examples:
Incoming Dataframe has following rows:

EMP_CD | EMP_NAME | DEPT | AGE
-------------------------------------------------------
E01 | DAVID | HR | 25
E05 | MARK | | 25
E02 | JOHN | SALES | 35
E03 | TONY | MARKETING |
E04 | MARTIN | MARKETING | 45

Incoming Dataframe has NULL values for two rows.
Using DropRowsWithNull node would result in below outgoing Dataframe created by dropping rows having NULL values in any of the columns:

EMP_CD | EMP_NAME | DEPT | AGE
-------------------------------------------------------
E01 | DAVID | HR | 25
E02 | JOHN | SALES | 35
E04 | MARTIN | MARKETING | 45

nodes.name: Feature Selection With Importance
nodes.details:
This node enables to select the top features using Feature Importance.

In the workflow editor, it outputs the incoming schema without any changes. The reason for it is that unless the workflow is fully executed on the full data, it does not know the list of the top features.

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: targetCol
fields.title: TargetCol
fields.description: Target column to be used when selecting the features

fields.name: featureCols
fields.title: Feature Columns
fields.description: The list of columns for which to calculate the feature importance

fields.name: mlType
fields.title: MLType
fields.description: target column type, Regression or Classification

fields.name: numfeatures
fields.title: NumFeatures
fields.description: Number features to be selected from Feature Importance calculated
